item.description:
The ultimate summer wine & food festival in New England returns on

August 19-21, 2011!

at the breathtaking Newport Yachting Center in Newport, Rhode Island. The event will continue to provide the ultimate experience with tastings from hundreds of world-class wines, spirits, specialty beers, lifestyle products and featured dishes prepared by celebrity, regional and local chefs

 I COULD GO ON AND ON ABOUT HOW FANTASTIC LAST YEAR WAS !

I HAVE NEVER ATE AND DRANK SO MUCH FANTASTIC FOOD AND WINE IN MY WHOLE LIFE.

Check it out and buy yout tickets online now :-)

www.newportwinefest.com

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "NEWPORT" Wine Festival "You Don't Want To Miss"
